div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 957 Adrianople (now Edirne) environs, (14) Thrace, before 1789 Burial: 2nd-1st cent. B.C. (T) Contents: AR Apollonia, Illyria: dr. Dyrrhachium: dr. Disposition: unknown Sestini, Lettere ... Ainslieana 1 (Leghorn, 1789), p. 130, note 1 Although Sestini indicates that the deposit was found in the vicinity of Adri- anople, its contents suggest a prove- nance further north
